Description.Name: Vandal And A Bully
Description.Details: The day after your eighteenth birthday, you were arrested and jailed for drunkenly assaulting local law enforcement, then kicked out of the company.

OptionDescription:
As the initial excitement turned into daily routine during garrison duty, discipline and inexperience led to a series of drunken brawls at the local bars nearby the barracks.

Until one day you used your [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralPhoenixHawk],Phoenix Hawk]] to level a couple buildings after the party got too hard. Unable to protect you anymore, your CO cuts a deal with the authorities for you to serve time doing hard labor despite the calls to publicly execute you after you attacked local forces.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorTactics],Tactics]]
BioDescription: Once a promising ex-slave, you committed violent acts while drunk, including vandalism, arson and assault of law enforcement. Unwilling to deal with your behavior, you were fired from the merc company and you took the bandit king's Phoenix Hawk you stole from your former dead master and set off to find a new life to call your own.
